definition[0]: a piece of furniture like a large cupboard that you hang clothes in
note[0]: fitted/built-in wardrobes (=wardrobes built against a wall or fitted between two walls)
example[0]: Can you hang these in the wardrobe, please?
note[1]: winter/summer etc wardrobe (=the clothes you have for a particular time of year)
example[1]: You can win a complete new wardrobe.
definition[2]: a department in a theatre, television company etc that deals with the clothes worn by actors
